name: Piece 42
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Spooktober Game Jam 2021

Theme: Sacrifice

Every year, the night after Halloween, bodies go missing and a gruesome amalgamation appears...

 A man in full white with a unique passion is ready.

Controls:

AD or Arrows to move.

Space to Interact.

Notes:

-The idea of the storyline was heavily inspired by Jhin mixed with a friend's suggestion.

 -Had I had more time, I would've been able to make  each of the characters playable giving more depth to them, but this week has been rough and busy.

-Sucks I forgot to put a logo.

Credits:

Made by Phamility | Twitter

Credo by Edward Karl Hanson | Youtube

Serial Killer by John Bartmann |  ChosicMusic
